| Overview = The '''Children of Lost Tarnax''' were religious zealots dedicated to preventing a half-breed from ascending the throne of the [[Skrull Empire]].
| History                 = The Children of the Lost Tarnax were a religious faction dedicated to the teachings to the late emperor [[Dorrek VII (Earth-616)|Dorrek VII]] which taught that the mating of [[Deviant Skrulls|Skrulls]] with other species was distasteful and a half-breed must not be allowed on to become the emperor of the [[Skrull Empire]]. Their name was a reference to [[Tarnax IV]], the Skrull throneworld that was devoured by [[Galan (Earth-616)|Galactus]].

The group assaulted [[Theodore Altman (Earth-616)|Teddy Altman]] at a gay bar when [[Bel-Dann (Earth-616)|Bel-Dann]] and [[Raksor (Earth-616)|Raksor]] came there to convince him to become the emperor of the united empire of the [[Kree]] and Skrulls, calling the two agents heretics for thinking such a notion. [[David Alleyne (Earth-616)|David Alleyne]] and [[Thomas Shepherd (Earth-616)|Tommy Shepherd]] assisted Bel-Dann and Raksor in fighting them, before the group surrendered after Teddy wielded the [[Excelsior (Star-Sword)|Excelsior]] in front of them.{{r|Lords of Empyre: Emperor Hulkling Vol 1 1}}
